title: Exquisite Floral Diamond Haaram with Multi-Colored Sapphires
materials: meticulously studded with brilliant-cut Diamonds. Features a vibrant array of Sapphires in shades of pink
yellow and green. Offers a radiant Hyderabadi Polish.
features: A stunning floral motif, reminiscent of a blooming garden. The diamonds are meticulously set to maximize brilliance. The arrangement of colored Sapphires adds a touch of modern artistry to this classic piece.
colors: Predominantly white (diamonds) with pops of pink
yellow and green from the Sapphires. Gold accents enhance the overall design.
occasions: and special occasions where you want to make a statement. Can also be worn for modern celebrations and high-end events.
description: This necklace is a fusion of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design. The brilliant diamonds and vivid Sapphires create a striking visual effect. A symbol of elegance and sophistication, this piece is a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
